Title: Requires mortgage investing institutions or their contracted vendors to be financially responsible for any interest or penalties charged as a result of an erroneous mortgage registration
Summary: Requires mortgage investing institutions or their contracted vendors to be financially responsible for any interest or penalties charged as a result of an erroneous mortgage registration filed by such institution or vendor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to requiring mortgage investing institutions or their contracted vendors to be financially responsible for any interest or penalties charged as a result of an erroneous mortgage registration filed by such institution or vendor
